introduction: This uneven, plodding melodrama about the trials of the upper class drew unintentional laughter from the audiences at the Casino Cinema. Julia Von Grolman plays the rich girl whose conservative father and psychologically disturbed mother fail to meet her needs. She falls for Pablo, a writer who is trying to write the great Argentine novel. Pablo kills Julia's dog after she destroys the manuscript for his book, but when her mother tries to kill herself, Julia and Pablo attempt to reconcile their differences. ~ Dan Pavlides, All Movie Guide
